name: gancio
description: Gancio is a community event platform that helps groups publish events with details, images, and maps. It is federated, privacy-first, and designed for grassroots or local organizations to publish events in a decentralized fashion.
features: Federated Events: Publish and share community events across federated instances for decentralized coordination.
Privacy-First Design: Host events without tracking or data collection, respecting user privacy by default.
Event Publishing: Create events with rich details, images, descriptions, and location information.
Map Integration: Display event locations on interactive maps for easy discovery and navigation.
Grassroots Organizing: Purpose-built for local communities and activist groups to coordinate activities.
Decentralized Network: Connect with other Gancio instances to share events across federated communities.
No Registration Required: Allow users to browse and discover events without mandatory account creation.
Community Calendar: Maintain a shared calendar for local organizations with collaborative event management.
